dashboard.label: Faster DMA and Search Performance
dashboard.description: Using enhancements to core search technology

ul.li: Data Model summarization lag is up to 1/3 less than 6.5
Acceleration searches run time is up to ~3x faster than 6.5
Responsiveness - acceleration data available for tstats querying constantly (no more waiting hours for a huge bucket to be accelerated)
Targeted towards improving Enterprise Security performance but works for any Data Model!
